remarks: Lemma for ~ grpoidcl and others.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpoidval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpoidval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpoidval $p |- ( G e. GrpOp -> U = ( iota_ u e. X A. x e. X ( u G x ) = x ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d U u x $.
$d X u x $.
